languages.text: "Хороший же я план составил — под стать себе, малодушному глупцу". {n}Гнев исчезает из его голоса, уступая место раскаянию.{/n} "Но теперь я вижу свои ошибки, и вы... Не отступились. Не позволили мне бесславно окончить свои дни. Значит, я еще чего-то стою".

"Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."
languages.original_text: "Хороший же я план составил — под стать себе, малодушному глупцу". {n}Гнев исчезает из его голоса, уступая место раскаянию.{/n} "Но теперь я вижу свои ошибки, и вы... Не отступились. Не позволили мне бесславно окончить свои дни. Значит, я еще чего-то стою".

traits.locale_text: "Some plan I've made for myself, the craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

"Some plan I've made for myself, the craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

"Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

"Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

"Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

"Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

languages.text: 「なんという計画を立ててしまったのだろう。臆病者め」{n}声から怒気が去っていき、後悔に変わっていく。{/n}「ですが、ようやく気付くことができました…あなたは諦めず、私がこの屈辱にまみれて最期を迎えるのを許しませんでした。ということは…私にはまだ価値があるということなのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

traits.locale_text: 「なんという計画を立ててしまったのだろう。臆病者め」{n}声から怒気が去っていき、後悔に変わっていく。{/n}「ですが、ようやく気付くことができました…あなたは諦めず、私がこの屈辱にまみれて最期を迎えるのを許しませんでした。ということは…私にはまだ価値があるということなのでしょう」

languages.text: "Toller Plan, den ich mir da ausgedacht habe. Feiger Narr." {n}Die Wut schwindet aus seiner Stimme und wird durch Reue ersetzt.{/n} "Doch nun sehe ich, wo ich gescheitert bin, und Ihr ... Ihr habt nicht nachgegeben, habt mich nicht meine Tage in dieser Schande beenden lassen. Das bedeutet wohl, dass ich immer noch etwas wert bin."
languages.original_text: "Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

traits.locale_text: "Toller Plan, den ich mir da ausgedacht habe. Feiger Narr." {n}Die Wut schwindet aus seiner Stimme und wird durch Reue ersetzt.{/n} "Doch nun sehe ich, wo ich gescheitert bin, und Ihr ... Ihr habt nicht nachgegeben, habt mich nicht meine Tage in dieser Schande beenden lassen. Das bedeutet wohl, dass ich immer noch etwas wert bin."

languages.text: «Menudo plan he trazado. Soy un cobarde lamentable». {n}La ira abandona su voz, dando paso a los remordimientos.{/n} «Pero ahora veo dónde he fracasado, y usted... no abandonó, no permitió que terminara mis días de forma vergonzosa. Supongo que de algo sigo sirviendo».
languages.original_text: "Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

traits.locale_text: «Menudo plan he trazado. Soy un cobarde lamentable». {n}La ira abandona su voz, dando paso a los remordimientos.{/n} «Pero ahora veo dónde he fracasado, y usted... no abandonó, no permitió que terminara mis días de forma vergonzosa. Supongo que de algo sigo sirviendo».

languages.text: “我给自己制定了那些计划，不过是个怯懦的白痴在找借口罢了。”{n}他声音中的愤怒慢慢消失了，取而代之的是悔恨。{/n}“但现在，我明白我错在了哪里，而你……你没有放弃，没有任由我在耻辱中结束我的生命。我想，这意味着我还能派上用场。”
languages.original_text: "Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

traits.locale_text: “我给自己制定了那些计划，不过是个怯懦的白痴在找借口罢了。”{n}他声音中的愤怒慢慢消失了，取而代之的是悔恨。{/n}“但现在，我明白我错在了哪里，而你……你没有放弃，没有任由我在耻辱中结束我的生命。我想，这意味着我还能派上用场。”

languages.text: "Ne güzel plan yapmışım ama kendime... Ödlek seni." {n}Sesindeki öfke yavaşça azalıp yerini pişmanlığa bırakıyor.{/n} "Ama artık nerede başarısız olduğumu görebiliyorum. Sense... Benden vazgeçip beni bu rezillik içinde yaşamaya terk etmedin. Demek ki hâlâ biraz da olsa değerim varmış."
languages.original_text: "Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

traits.locale_text: "Ne güzel plan yapmışım ama kendime... Ödlek seni." {n}Sesindeki öfke yavaşça azalır ve yerini pişmanlığa bırakır.{/n} "Ama artık erede başarısız olduğumu görebiliyorum. Ve sen... Benden vazgeçip beni bu rezillik içinde yaşamaya terk etmedin. Demek ki hâlâ biraz da olsa değerim varmış."

languages.text: « Dans quelle situation me suis-je mis... Misérable lâche que je suis. {n}La colère s'évapore de sa voix, laissant place au remords.{/n} Mais je vois à présent où j'ai failli. Et vous... ne m'avez pas abandonné. Vous ne m'avez pas laissé finir mes jours dans l'ignominie. J'en conclus que je n'ai pas encore perdu toute valeur. »
languages.original_text: "Some plan I've made for myself. Craven fool." {n}Anger retreats from his voice, giving way to remorse.{/n} "But now I see where I have failed, and you... you didn't relent, didn't let me end my days in this ignominy. I guess that means I'm still worth something."

traits.locale_text: « Dans quelle situation me suis-je mis... Misérable lâche que je suis. {n}La colère s'évapore de sa voix, laissant place au remords.{/n} Mais je vois à présent où j'ai failli. Et vous... ne m'avez pas abandonné. Vous ne m'avez pas laissé finir mes jours dans l'ignominie. J'en conclus que je n'ai pas encore perdu toute valeur. »
